sanskrit_verse:
एवं सम्यग्विर्हुत्वा सर्वदिक्षु प्रदक्षिणम् ।
इन्द्रान्तकाप्पतीन्दुभ्यः सानुगेभ्यो बलिं हरेत् ॥ ३.८७॥
transliteration:
evaṁ samyagvihutvā sarvadiṣu pradakṣiṇam |
indrāntakāppatīndubhyaḥ sānugebhyo baliṁ haret || 3.87||
sph_interpretive_translation: Thus having performed the sacrifice correctly, offering circumambulation in all directions, one shall offer oblations to Indra, Antaka, Aapati, and Chandra along with their followers.
